poemsDataJson.list_full: 夏(なつ)の夜(よ)は まだ宵(よひ)ながら 明(あ)けぬるを 雲(くも)のいづこに 月(つき)宿(やど)るらむ
poemsDataJson.list_full_en: In the summer night//The evening still seems present,//But the dawn is here.//To what region of the clouds//Has the wandering moon come home?
poemsDataJson.list_full_romaji: Natsu no yo wa|Mada yoi nagara|Ake nuru o|Kumo no izuko ni|Tsuki yadoru ran
poemsDataJson.list_torifuda: くものいつこに つきやとるらむ
poemsDataJson.author: 清原深養父(きよはらのふかやぶ)
poemsDataJson.poem_theme: 雲の彼方に姿を隠している、夏の夜の月を惜しむ心
